import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update Owner of Content Object "}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/content/{contentType}/{key}/owner"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update the owner of a content object.
Only owners can perform this action. 

>**Note:** You have to specify the content type.
>For [articles](../../docs/guides/content/articles) it is `articles` and for
>[file metadata](../../docs/guides/file-storage/metadata) it is `files`.

You can find more information about content management [here](../../docs/guides/content/management).

>**Note:** The old owner will automatically be demoted to a [`MAINTAINER`](../../docs/guides/content/introduction#object-specific-roles-shared-state)
>role if the action was successful.

### Locale

A locale can be specified for this request. 
The email will be sent in the specified locale.
You can learn more about locale in emails [here](../../docs/guides/email/templates).

If no locale is specified, the applications default locale will be used.
You can learn more about configuring the default locale [here](../../docs/guides/configuration).

### Tokens
- A valid [`AccessToken`](../../docs/guides/auth/tokens#access-token)
  of the owner of this content object is required.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"contentType","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"key","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"req","in":"query","required":true,"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"newOwnerId":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"date":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"}},"title":"ObjectId"}},"required":["newOwnerId"],"title":"UpdateOwnerRequest"}},{"name":"locale","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"The updated content object. The response depends on the content object. For [articles](../../docs/guides/content/articles) it will return [`FullArticleResponse`](../../docs/api/schemas/fullarticleresponse)and for [file metadata](../../docs/guides/file-storage/metadata) it will return [`FileMetadataResponse`](../../docs/api/schemas/filemetadataresponse).","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"title":"ContentResponseObject"}}}},"401":{"description":"Invalid or expired `AccessToken`.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}},"403":{"description":"AccessToken does is not of the owner of the content object.","content":{"*/*":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"timestamp":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"error":{"type":"string"},"message":{"type":"string"},"path":{"type":"string"}},"required":["error","status","timestamp"],"title":"ErrorResponse"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
